Description: Job includes trainings in Europe and frequent traveling in the Middle East for servicing customers. The job includes:  Installing and starting up new machines and training technicians on how to use these machines  Maintenance of previously installed machines  Sales and marketing of new developments by the suppliers Skills
Skills: Field of Study: Mechanical, Mechatronics or Electrical Engineer
Personal qualities:  Seeking long term career as this job offers possibilities for advancement. Strong personality, good communication skills and team player.
Languages: Speak and write Arabic and English fluently.
